interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Supernatural: Season 11 [DVD]
Review Date: 2016/10/11
Store: Jared Padalecki  (Actor),     Jensen Ackles  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
Product Description: ['Supernatural: The Complete Eleventh Season (DVD)', "The thrilling and terrifying journey of the Winchester brothers continues as SUPERNATURAL enters its 11th season. In the show's tenth season, the Winchesters faced their most personal threat yet. The all-powerful Mark of Cain threatened to consume Dean, turning him into one of the monsters he has spent his life hunting. Meanwhile, a formidable witch, Rowena, rose to power to claim her position at the right hand of the King of Hell, Crowley (Mark A. Sheppard). Once Rowena revealed herself to be Crowley's mother, the King was forced to choose between his family and the Winchesters - all while Sam, with the help of fallen angel Castiel (Misha Collins), Crowley, and some unlikely allies, wages a desperate battle to save Dean from the Mark of Cain. Will Sam be able to find a cure for the Mark in time? Will it be enough to save his brother? And a more frightening prospect ... does Dean even want to be saved?", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror, Drama, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Box set, AC-3, Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jared Padalecki, Jeremy Carver, Mark Sheppard, Jensen Ackles, Misha Collins, Phil Sgriccia', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 7.84 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Box set, AC-3, Dolby, DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '16 hours and 52 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 6, 2016', 'Actors': 'Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Misha Collins, Mark Sheppard', 'Dubbed': 'English, Japanese', 'Subtitles': 'Portuguese, Spanish, French, Thai, Korean', 'Producers': 'Jeremy Carver, Phil Sgriccia', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: Pretty much awesome as ever!
Review Title: Love it!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: Strong preference for supernatural themes, horror, and drama genres, especially in television series.
- **Content Type**: Enjoys boxed sets and comprehensive collections that provide a complete viewing experience.
- **Format Preference**: Favors DVDs for home viewing with an appreciation for high-quality audio and subtitle options.
- **Engagement**: Actively engages with content from favorite actors and creators, showing brand loyalty and enthusiasm for work associated with specific actors.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to rate highly, indicating a tendency to express satisfaction with purchased media.

Overall, the user demonstrates a focused interest in supernatural horror dramas featuring character-driven storytelling, emphasizing their affinity for complete series collections and engaging narratives. They exhibit a positive engagement with the media they consume, particularly valuing the presence of beloved actors.
